articles.title: Meteor showers in 2021 that will light up night skies - TODAYonline
articles.description: NEW YORK — All year long as Earth revolves around the sun, it passes through streams of cosmic debris. The resulting meteor showers can light up night skies from dusk to dawn, and if you’re lucky you might be able to catch one.
